title: Lordshiva
author: Lordshiva
content: Hello everyone...I am a freelance article writer desperately looking for some work now.Since last 5 6 months I have not been able to work as I have been running hospital because my mother has been very sick. I dont want to talk about that but currently I dont have any work and a lot of bills to pay.I have written articles for notatether you can check herehttps://notatether.com/author/utkarshmishra/I promise I will provide 100% good quality content to you.If anyone is looking for a content writer please give me the chance.My telegram id is - @Utkarshm_1

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Lordshiva on July 17, 2022, 06:37:35 AMHello everyone...I am a freelance article writer desperately looking for some work now.Since last 5 6 months I have not been able to work as I have been running hospital because my mother has been very sick. I dont want to talk about that but currently I dont have any work and a lot of bills to pay.I have written articles for notatether you can check herehttps://notatether.com/author/utkarshmishra/I promise I will provide 100% good quality content to you.If anyone is looking for a content writer please give me the chance.My telegram id is - @Utkarshm_1You might also send a Pm to NotATether and ask them to give you a vouch in this thread. Getting vouches from previous clients could help you get some more leads to new work. Just a suggestion.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on November 07, 2022, 02:25:51 AMYou might also send a Pm to NotATether and ask them to give you a vouch in this thread. Getting vouches from previous clients could help you get some more leads to new work. Just a suggestion.I came here on my own.Yes, I can vouch for him (and everyone else who I employed for article writing on my site). They're all much higher quality than the AI-copywriting scrap that is being sold nowadays on this board.

comments.author: tam31
